code: import{configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import filterSlice from"./slices/filterSlice.ts";import cartSlice from"./slices/cartSlice.ts";import pizza from"./slices/pizzaClice";export var store=configureStore({reducer:{filterSlice:filterSlice,cartSlice:cartSlice,pizza:pizza}});// reducer: { filterSlice },, создали хранилище
